cause.description:
I am reviving Cthulhu. He shall rise again. Join as a supporter of this cause.
Wow! There's over 500 members! I didn't think this would actually grow! This was just about me making a papier mache Cthulu in my basement, I had no idea that this would spread past 5 people. Thanks everyone who's joined!
1. Raise Cthulhu
cause.mission: Bring Cthulhu back from his sleep in the city of Ry'leh
cause.name: Cthulhu Reincarnation
